column4: Upgraded RAM from 8GB to 16GB, also upgraded SWAP from 8GB to 40GB (shouldn't matter), but now SUSPEND to RAM doesn't want to work, please any ideas?
how exactly did you upgrade swap from 8 GB to 40 GB? is it one continuous partition?
Ah, just had a brainwave, may be that USB3 is still enabled in BIOS, will check it out and come back to ya.
have another drive, added swap partition, and moved in fstab
